attributes.action: Seize all empty, Russian property in UK and use it to house Ukrainian refugees.
attributes.additional_details: It would send a clear signal to Russian investors who keep properties empty for speculative capital gain that their vacant proprties are an aberration when so many people from Ukraine are in dire need of safety and shelter.
attributes.background: The Government should use powers to seize russian owned property, much as they are freezing Russian assets, and use the buildings to house refugees from the war in Ukraine.

rejection.details:
Decisions about housing refugees is an operational decision for the Home Office and individual local authorities, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Seize assets held by anyone with close ties to the Russian government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418

Seize frozen Russian assets and give proceeds to Ukraine to help with rebuilding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610119
